quoteText:
In special limited cirumstances we may be required to disclose your data without express consent, these are:

  1. When we have a good faith belief it is required by law.
  2. When we have a good faith belief it is necessary to protect our rights or property.
  3. To any successor or purchaser in a merger, acquisition, liquidation, dissolution or sale of assets.
title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

In special limited cirumstances we may be required to disclose your data without express consent, these are:
To any successor or purchaser in a merger, acquisition, liquidation, dissolution or sale of assets.
